resources.string: no semester created yet\nclick the plus icon below to create one
Hey, Check out My College CGPA, an interesting app that tracks and keeps record of your college academic performance. Get it for free at
Manage and keep track of your college academic performance with ease, sign up and sync across all your devices
By using my college cgpa, you agree to our Terms & Privacy Policy

my college cgpa app helps college/university students to keep record of their academic performances,it also provides real-time statistics of the student\'s performances in which you can track in accordance with your semester,you can as well download the statistics record as a pdf file,share semesters with friends or families,sign up and sync across multiple devices and guess what, it\'s absolutely free.

to create a semester, click on the floating action button below your thumb in the my semster screen.
to add courses, click on the just created semester and you will be navigated to a screen, in that same screen, click on + button at the bottom right corner to add courses.
to log out, navigate to the others screen, click on the log out button.
to share your semster, swipe right on the semester item and swipe left to delete.
Please Note: Changes will occur when next you create or edit a course
your best semester will be shown here
